tool_description: The LYRICSnMUSIC API allows your site to legally display up to 150 characters of a songs lyrics with a link back to our copyright compliant lyric page or you can simply link back to the lyrics without displaying them on your App/Site.
name: LYRICSnMUSIC
title: LYRICSnMUSIC

api_list.name: Search Lyrics
api_list.description: By artist name, song title, or lyrics words
